author: lgo
msg: Followup to r18465: add an extra testcase to validate that keyword
unexpansion and expansion works for files containing a $ sign.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/trans_tests.py:
(setup_working_copy): added new id_exp_with_dollar_path
(keywords_from_birth): add testcase that unexpands and expands
the Id keyword correctly for file 'id_exp with_$_sign'.

author: malcolm
msg: Followup to r19915, correcting a typo in a comment.
* configure.in
(APR_VER_REGEXES): Correct comment.
* packages/rpm/redhat-7.x/apr.patch
* packages/rpm/redhat-8+/apr.patch
* packages/rpm/rhel-3/apr.patch
* packages/rpm/rhel-4/apr.patch
(configure.in): Adjust patches to account for above.

author: dws
msg: * packages/rpm/redhat-7.x/apr.patch,
packages/rpm/redhat-8+/apr.patch,
packages/rpm/rhel-3/apr.patch,
packages/rpm/rhel-4/apr.patch : Fix patch file broken in r19915.  This fix
allows the RPMs to build again.

author: dlr
msg: On the merge-tracking branch: Punch a merge info retrieval operation
through svnserve, via the repos, down to the FS.
* subversion/include/svn_repos.h
(svn_repos_fs_get_merge_info): Add function decl to fetch merge
information for a set of paths.
* subversion/libsvn_repos/fs-wrap.c
(svn_repos_fs_get_merge_info): Implement function.  While unreadable
paths for which merge info are requested are filtered out,
unreadable paths are NOT filtered out of the returned merge info.
* subversion/svnserve/serve.c
(get_merge_info): Add a new function to get the merge info for a
list of paths at a specific revision.
(main_commands): Add get_merge_info to the list as "get-merge-info".

author: lgo
msg: Add extra test to validate that checkout uses the peg rev if provided.
This tests the change committed in r18422.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/basic_tests.py:
(checkout_peg_rev): New test.
(test_list): Run the new checkout test.
